title: Father and Son - The Rats Are Leaving The Ship (Single) 2015 ak7
description:
Father and Son-Unholy Ghost, Great album I can hear this becoming very popular ,why?
Cause this has a bunch of catchy tunes and its decent old school Metal
. 
These guys are good they got a bunch of hooks and the songs are quick moving but not blinding speed . 
Its good old school rock along the lines of Some old Alabama Thunder Pussy from 1998-2000.
 And can also work for Some CoC from 2004-08.

So grab a smoke and a drink and give this about 10 min. I think you will like it. 

Tracklist


1.The Rats Are Leaving The Ship    4:20m               9.94mb

2.Gloom Room                       5:12m              11.91mb

3.Holy Ghost                       5:21m              12.25mb



As normal go to the shows and buy the merch,thats the best way to support the artist, all of that money goes to the band. Not to the DMCA
